name: Dead Shits
description:
Dead Shits is a cartoony platformer with traps, enemies and time pressure in fantasy worlds.
Some levels can be destroyed, so be careful!

Are you ready for a difficult game without extra lifes or convenient spawnpoints?
Each level have a different world to explore, with its own feeling and great music.
Your highscore will be saved for completing the whole game of 10 levels.
So be prepared for this unique game and try your best!
